Description: With several PROTAC-based drug candidates now in clinical trials, the field of Targeted Protein Degradation (TPD) has entered a new phase focused on fully exploiting the cellular proteolysis machinery to eliminate disease-causing proteins.  Early discovery efforts are currently focused on the exploration of new protein targets (many of which have not been previously pharmaceutically vulnerable) as well as new E3 ligases (many of which are tissue- or disease- restricted).  The presentations will describe three different creative approaches taken in these ongoing explorations and include novel chemoproteomic experimental designs as well as cutting-edge chemical biology strategies for target protein identification.
SearchResultBody: SY17. Targeted Protein Degradation: Exploring New Targets and E3 Ligases
Title: Targeted Protein Degradation: Exploring New Targets and E3 Ligases
